title: Tech Giants Want to Own Your Summer Vacation
sub_head: Over the past two weeks both Airbnb and Uber Technologies have unveiled big, multipronged platform updates
body:
One thing not in short supply right now are product announcements in the online travel sector.
Over the past two weeks both Airbnb and Uber Technologies have unveiled big, multipronged platform updates, ostensibly to better serve consumers and make them more comfortable using their platforms as pent-up travel demand surges. The changes are as crucial to their bottom lines as to travelersâ€™ sanity.
